amendment.description: To treat electric transmission property as 15-year property.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3040 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3040 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Nickles. (consideration: CR S5217-5218) To treat electric transmission property as 15-year property.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3040 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3040 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Nickles.
